ogdl

Class Ogdl

  • java.lang.Object
    • ogdl.Ogdl

  • public class Ogdl
extends Object
    This class contains some easy functions to parse OGDL (convert text or binary OGDL to a Graph object).

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Ogdl() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static IGraph parse(InputStream in)
      Read OGDL text from an InputStream and return it as Graph
      static IGraph parse(String file)
      Read an OGDL file and return it as Graph
      static IGraph parseBinary(byte[] buf)
      Parse a binary OGDL stream from a byte buffer
      static IGraph parseBinary(InputStream in)
      Parse a binary OGDL stream.
      static IGraph parseBinary(RandomAccessFile in)
      Parse a binary OGDL stream from a RandomAccessFile.
      static IGraph parseString(String s)
      Read an OGDL string and return it as Graph
